title: What if you had a ten-year nightmare? [Rebroadcast - #103]
description:
"The hardest part is that I still don't have any answers...what came into my house that night?"

 

Producer: Whit Missildine

 

Episode Summary: A musician is sideswiped by a sudden break into a nightmarish world that will not let him go

 

This episode is part of the Summer 2021 rebroadcast series, featuring listener favorites from the back catalogue. All episodes in this rebroadcast series were released prior to episode #130, which are currently exclusive to the Wondery Plus. Today’s episode originally aired as #103 in November 2017


Wondery Plus: All episodes of the show prior to episode #130 are now part of the Wondery Plus premium service. To access the full catalog of episodes, and get all episodes ad free, sign up for Wondery Plus at https://wondery.com/plus

Episode Sponsors: Caliper: trycaliper.com/happening; Grove: grove.co/happening; ThredUp: thredup.com/happening

Social Media: Instagram: @actuallyhappening

Website: www.thisisactuallyhappening.com

 

Support the Show: Support The Show on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/happening

 

Engage with the Community: Join the This Is Actually Happening Discussion Group on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/201783687561039/

 

Shop at the Store: The This Is Actually Happening online store is now officially open. Follow this link: www.thisisactuallyhappening.com/shop to access branded t-shirts, posters, stickers and more from the shop. 

 

Content/Trigger Warnings: sexual violence, hallucination, explicit language

 

Intro Music: ""Illabye" – Tipper

Music Bed:   Original Score & Sound Design: Ryan Black - ryanblack.io

 

Services

If you or someone you know is struggling with the effects of trauma or mental illness, please refer to the following resources:

 

National Suicide Prevention Lifeline: 1-800-273-8255 

National Alliance on Mental Illness: 1-800-950-6264

National Sexual Assault Hotline (RAINN): 1-800-656-HOPE (4673)

Crisis Text Line: Within the US, text HOME to 741741

 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
